data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.2 Dev Beta 5
data.actual_result: There is a dark bar at the bottom of the screen
data.expected_result: There isn't a dark bar at the bottom of the screen
data.short_description: [iPhone X/XS/XR/XS Max] Deleting a server while you are in a voice chat in that server will leave a dark bar at the bottom of your screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat on a server - Go into server settings and delete the server - Observe the bottom of the screen
